TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClientTarget extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ClientTarget Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 定义与目标用户代理关联的别名，ASP.NET 服务器控件应呈现该用户代理的内容。

span.span: Defines the alias associated with the target user agent for which ASP.NET server controls should render content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是指在中添加的元素`clientTarget`配置文件节。The class refers to elements that are added in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. 类所属的组将包括类和类。The class belongs to a group that includes the class and the class. 类包含两个标识客户端浏览器中，也称为用户代理属性。The class contains two properties identifying a client browser, also named user agent. 一个属性是与客户端浏览器由第二个属性关联的别名。One property is the alias associated with the client browser identified by the second property. ASP.NET 使用此信息来呈现在页中的服务器控件。ASP.NET uses this information to render server controls in a page. 有关如何以编程方式使用用户代理或其别名的信息，请参阅属性。For information about how the user agent or its alias is used programmatically, see the property. 有关如何以声明方式使用用户代理或其别名的信息，请参阅[@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)。For information about how the user agent or its alias is used declaratively, see [@ Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4). 如果未设置属性，与关联的对象属性反映客户端浏览器的功能。If the property is not set, the object that is associated with the property reflects the capabilities of the client browser. （它反映的浏览器类型，但不一定该浏览器的特定实例中的设置的功能）。设置该属性，如果禁用客户端浏览器检测，并且页面将使用与你定义的用户代理字符串相关联的浏览器功能。(It reflects the capabilities of the browser type, but not necessarily the settings in a specific instance of that browser.) If the property is set, the client browser detection is disabled and the page uses browser capabilities that are associated with the user agent string that you define. 你可以将此属性设置为任何有效的用户代理字符串。You can set this property to any valid user agent string. ## Examples 本部分提供两个代码示例。This section provides two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值类。The first demonstrates how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. 第二部分演示如何获取从配置文件的对象。The second shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file. 此对象用于访问对象包含。You use this object to access the objects it contains. 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式指定的多个属性的值类。The following code example shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从配置文件的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Alias As String
public: property System::String ^ Alias { System::String ^ get(); };

value.span: 用于引用特定用户代理的名称。

span.span: The name used to refer to a specific user agent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是指`alias`属性`add`中的元素`clientTarget`配置文件节。The property refers to the `alias` attribute of the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. ASP.NET 配置默认值包括以下别名：The ASP.NET configuration defaults include the following aliases: - `uplevel`它将告诉 ASP.NET 以 HTML 和 Internet Explorer 6.0 和更高版本支持的 ECMAScript 发送。`uplevel`, which tells ASP.NET to send HTML and ECMAScript that is supported by Internet Explorer 6.0 and later versions. - `downlevel`它将告诉 ASP.NET，若要限制的 HTML 和浏览器都支持早于 Internet Explorer 6.0 的版本的脚本。`downlevel`, which tells ASP.NET to limit the HTML and script to the versions that are supported by browsers earlier than Internet Explorer 6.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件。The following code example shows how to get the from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#3)]

Public ReadOnly Property UserAgent As String
public: property System::String ^ UserAgent { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用户代理的标识名称。

span.span: Gets the user agent's identification name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是指`userAgent`属性`add`中的元素`clientTarget`配置文件节。The property refers to the `userAgent` attribute of the `add` element in the `clientTarget` section of the configuration file. ASP.NET 配置默认设置允许自定义为各个 Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本的页。The ASP.NET configuration defaults allow customizing pages for various Microsoft Internet Explorer versions. 它们之间找到别名`uplevel`，它将告诉 ASP.NET 以 HTML 和由 Internet Explorer 4.0 和更高版本，支持的 ECMAScript 发送客户端和`downlevel`，它将告诉 ASP.NET，若要限制的 HTML 和将脚本保存到支持的较早的浏览器，比Internet Explorer 4.0。Among them you find the alias `uplevel`, which tells ASP.NET to send the client HTML and ECMAScript supported by Internet Explorer 4.0 and later, and `downlevel`, which tells ASP.NET to limit the HTML and script to that supported by earlier browsers than Internet Explorer 4.0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件。The following code example shows how to get the from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/CS/clienttarget.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ClientTarget/VB/clienttarget.vb#4)]
